The message of mercy Jesus brought from the Father was to save the perishing. The Father collected the riches of the universe, laid open the 
                                                                           777
resources of His infinite wisdom, and gave all into the hands of Christ to give to men. What more could God do to convince men there is no love but the love of God revealed in His Son? The happiness of man consists in loving God and in keeping His commandments, giving the best and most holy affections to Jesus Christ.
